snippet.title: Youjuu Kikouhei WerDragon (妖獣機甲兵ワードラゴン) for the NEC PC-88
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

Youjuu Kikouhei WerDragon (Armored Beast Soldier WerDragon), or simply WerDragon, is a side-scrolling cyberpunk action game with shooting and platforming elements.

Prologue:
On this day, S-CITY (Sequential Circuit City) did not wake up.
The eerie dark clouds that swirled around the city.
From there, pale flashes were emitted many times, and the heartbeat that sprung up from the bottom of the earth was transmitted, and no one could see what was happening in the isolated city.
The federal government of Roland, who saw the situation seriously, sent elite troops to S-CITY to investigate the cause of the incident and rescue VIPs. However, expectations were low, and the troops disappeared immediately after infiltrating S-CITY.
A few days later, the dark clouds gradually cleared up. At the same time, there was a strange landscape of the changing city and the appearance of people who became crazy.
The creation of the horrifying and crazy demon world began in this city.
